api_list.name: Crypto Value

Get the latest value of any crypto currency
Use Currency Codes [Here](https://www.ifcmarkets.com/en/cryptocurrency-abbreviations)

api_list.name: Quote
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://d99-multipurpose-api-free.p.rapidapi.com/quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "d99-multipurpose-api-free.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://d99-multipurpose-api-free.p.rapidapi.com/quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "d99-multipurpose-api-free.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
